'''spania''' in [[Telerin]] means "cloud". 
==Etymology==
It derived from a stem [[SPAN]] "white"<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}} p.387</ref>). See [[Primitive Elvish]] ''[[spâna]]''
==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[fanya]]''
